title: The Goblin Cave
description: A group of goblins has been raiding nearby farms. Track them to their cave and stop them!

nodes.title: Cave Entrance
nodes.description: You arrive at the mouth of a dark cave. You can hear goblin voices echoing from within.

nodes.title: Goblin Den
nodes.description: A goblin is sitting around a fire, roasting something unpleasant. They spot you and attack!

nodes.title: Goblin Chief's Chamber
nodes.description: A large goblin chief sits on a throne made of stolen goods. He roars and charges at you!

nodes.title: Victory!
nodes.description: You have defeated the goblins! The farms are safe once again. Well done, hero!

nodes.title: Retreat
nodes.description: You decide not to risk it and return to town. The goblin raids continue...
